titleStmt.title: The life of William Bedell D.D., Lord Bishop of Killmore in Ireland written by Gilbert Burnet. To which are subjoyned certain letters which passed betwixt Spain and England in matter of religion, concerning the general motives to the Roman obedience, between Mr. James Waddesworth ... and the said William Bedell ...
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
Bedell, William, 1571-1642. Copies of certain letters which have passed between Spain & England in matter of religion.
Wadsworth, James, 1604-1656?

notesStmt.note: "The copies of certain letters which have passed between Spain & England in matter of religion" (p. 265-487) has special t.p., dated 1685.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
